item.title: Indulge in Glamour at the Bund
item.description: The renowned ‘M’ Restaurant Group, led by Shanghai’s celebrated entrepreneur Michelle Garnaut, has unveiled Glam, a chic new dining lounge and bar in Shanghai. Situated at 5 on the Bund, the location previously housed the iconic M on the Bund restaurant. Michelle Garnaut, known for establishing new dining benchmarks in Asia, began her restaurant empire with M at the Fringe in Hong Kong in 1989. She later spearheaded Shanghai’s return to sophistication with M on the Bund in 1999 and elevated the city’s nightlife with The Glamour Bar in 2006.
